title: Define SourceSpan and SourcePos types
body:
Define the fundamental source location types used throughout the compiler.

**Deliverables:**
- `SourcePos` struct: file path (or file ID), line, column (all 1-based)
- `SourceSpan` struct: start `SourcePos`, end `SourcePos`
- `SourceSpan.merge(other)` to combine two spans
- `SourceSpan.pretty()` for human-readable rendering (e.g. `Foo.hs:10:5-10:20`)
- Unit tests for all operations

**Design notes:**
- Use a string-interning table or integer file IDs to avoid duplicating file paths
- Consider GHC's `SrcSpan` as reference (it has `RealSrcSpan` and `UnhelpfulSpan`)
- These types will be used by every subsequent pipeline stage
